00047 void EagleDbTable_addColumn(EagleDbTable *table, EagleDbColumn *column)
00048 {
00049     EagleLinkedListItem *item = EagleLinkedListItem_New(column, EagleTrue, (void(*)(void*)) EagleDbColumn_Delete);
00050     
00051     if(NULL == table->columns) {

00055     EagleLinkedList_add(table->columns, item);

00068 EagleDbColumn* EagleDbTable_getColumnByName(EagleDbTable *table, char *name)
00069 {
00070     EagleLinkedListItem *cursor;
00071     
00072     for(cursor = EagleLinkedList_begin(table->columns); NULL != cursor; cursor = cursor->next) {
00073         EagleDbColumn *col = (EagleDbColumn*) cursor->obj;
00074         if(0 == strcmp(col->name, name)) {
00075             return col;
00076         }
00077     }
00078     
00079     return NULL;
00080 }
